alert.note: Alert for Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 2:13PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Dolores and north central Montezuma Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 213 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles north of Dolores, or 39 miles northwest of Durango, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stoner. This includes Colorado 145 between mile markers 21 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Southwest San Juan Mountains
